snippet: A coroner has ruled that the three middle-aged siblings found dead after their house in Azusa, Calif., burned had all committed suicide with gunshots to the head.
abstract: Coroner rules that George, Barbara and Christine Alva, three middle-aged siblings found dead after their house in Azusa, Calif, burned down, had all committed suicide with gunshots to the head.
lead_paragraph: A coroner has ruled that the three middle-aged siblings found dead after their house in Azusa, Calif., burned had all committed suicide with gunshots to the head.

headline.seo: Three Siblings Dead in California Fire Are Ruled Suicides
headline.main: Three Siblings Ruled Suicides at Site of Fire
headline.print_headline: Three Siblings Ruled Suicides At Site of Fire
